* <nowiki>[[MichiganTeam-BugJamNotes|Notes]]</nowiki> from Bug Jam.

=== Where? When? ===

* Location: Oakland University
** Building "OC", <nowiki>[[http://www2.oakland.edu/map/|map]]</nowiki>
** Rooms 129 and 130

=== What Are We Doing? ===
'''A Bug Jam'''
  
We are going to be getting together and learning how to do bug triaging for Ubuntu.  This is a great way for everyone to get involved in Ubuntu and help make it better.
